attributes.action: secondary schools to start at a later time, preferably 10:30 am
attributes.additional_details: a later start will increase productivity and decrease the number of fights and help with mental health problems in teenagers.
attributes.background:
teenagers naturally have a body clock with during puberty is approximately 2 times slower than an adult and a lack of sleep in teenagers can cause symptoms such as:
fatigue 
depression 
some teens mimicking ADHD
